text: Daniel Marshall Pierce (March 31, 1928 â€“ February 13, 2020) was an American lawyer and politician. He was a Democratic member of the Illinois House of Representatives from 1965 to 1985. He was Mayor of Highland Park, Illinois from 1987 to 1995 and again from 1999 to 2003. Pierce was born in Chicago. Pierce died at his home in Highland Park on February 13, 2020 at the age of 91. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Politicians from Highland Park, Illinois Category:Lawyers from Chicago Category:Politicians from Chicago Category:American mayors Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Daniel M. Pierce
